Class AbstractTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.AbstractTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Meter, Timer

    public abstract class AbstractTimer
extends Object
implements Timer
    Base class to simplify implementing a Timer.
